text: Kwaapfila hana iwanu ing'awompfuka Imulungu iwengile chinyelenyele mghati mwetu, iwanu iwoghalusa usenga we uluso we Imulungu wetu ili wadahe kutenda ughoni, nawo womlema Yesu Kiristu, Mkulu na Imtwatsa wetu yaliyeka. Lekeni kulawa ghumwande Ghamaandiko Mahenzeluka ghalonga ukuhighighwa ikuwabeta iwanu awo.
